description: Students explore service to human beings as a profession, a vocation, and a volunteer commitment.
Who needs help?  Who helps?  Where?  How?  What motivates people to help?  Using the liberal arts
as a foundation for helping people, students study career opportunities in areas such as health
care, social services, ministry, youth work, and the arts.  The class includes lectures,
discussions, speakers, and field visits; additional fee. Open only to first year students.  Offered
